data.title: Madonna I'm Going To Tell You A Secret UK 2-disc CD/DVD set
data.meta_description: MADONNA I'm Going To Tell You A Secret (2006 UK Special Edition 2-disc set comprising a 14-track CD album featuring a collection of live tracks recorded during her critically acclaimed 2004 Re-invention Tour including Vogue, Like A Prayer, Holiday and her poignant interpretation of John Lennon's Imagine plus the Bonus Region 2-5 PAL DVD featuring Jonas Akerlund's artistic and compelling documentary which sees Madonna at her most personal, political and spiritual both professionally Tracklisting & Info: CD: 1. The Beast Within 2. Vogue 3. Nobody Knows Me 4. American Life 5. Hollywood - Remix 6. Die Another Day 7. Lament 8. Like A Prayer 9. Mother And Father 10. Imagine 11. Susan McLeod / Into The Groove 12. Music 13. Holiday 14. I Love New York DVD - I'm Going To Tell You A Secret: Directed by Jonas Akerlund, the artistic and compelling documentary sees Madonna at her most personal, political and spiritual – both professionally and personally and includes 16 mins of unseen footage. Year of Release - 2006 Format - 2-disc CD/DVD set Record Label - Warner Catalogue No - 9362499902 Country of Origin - United Kingdom Barcode - 093624999027 Availability - In Stock

MADONNA I'm Going To Tell You A Secret (2006 UK Special Edition 2-disc set comprising a 14-track CD album featuring a collection of live tracks recorded during her critically acclaimed 2004 Re-invention Tour including Vogue, Like A Prayer, Holiday and her poignant interpretation of John Lennon's Imagine plus the Bonus Region 2-5 PAL DVD featuring Jonas Akerlund's artistic and compelling documentary which sees Madonna at her most personal, political and spiritual both professionally& personally and includes previously unreleased bonus footage!)

TRACKLISTING AND EXTRA INFORMATION

CD:

1. The Beast Within

2. Vogue

3. Nobody Knows Me

4. American Life

5. Hollywood - Remix

6. Die Another Day

7. Lament

8. Like A Prayer

9. Mother And Father

10. Imagine

11. Susan McLeod / Into The Groove

12. Music

13. Holiday

14. I Love New York

DVD - I'm Going To Tell You A Secret:

Directed by Jonas Akerlund, the artistic and compelling documentary sees Madonna at her most personal, political and spiritual – both professionally and personally and includes 16 mins of unseen footage.

Artist - Madonna (click link for complete listing)

Title - I'm Going To Tell You A Secret (click link for more of the same title)

Year of Release - 2006

Format - 2-disc CD/DVD set

Record Label - Warner

Catalogue No - 9362499902 (click link for more)

Country of Origin - United Kingdom (UK)

Language - Regardless of country of origin all tracks are sung in English, unless otherwise stated in our description.

Additional info - Deleted, Picture Sleeve

Barcode - 093624999027

Condition - This item is in Excellent condition or better (unless it says otherwise in the above description). We buy items as close to Mint condition as possible and many will be unplayed and as close to new as you could hope to find. Irrespective of the source, all of our collectables meet our strict grading and are 100% guaranteed. Click here for more info.

RareVinyl.com Ref No - MAD2DIM362260

Alternative Names - Madge,Madona,Maddona,Maddonna.

Related Artists - Accidental Potato Chip, Austin Powers, Blonde Ambition, Donna DeLory, Funk Freaks Vs MH, Guy Ritchie, Jellybean, Jose & Luis, Mad Donna, Mad House, MC Miker G & Deejay Sven, Me'Shell Ndegeocello, Mirage, Mirwais, Nick Kamen, Nick Scotti, Niki Haris, Out Of Your Mouth, PreMadonna, Rollergirl, Taxi Girl, Who's That Girl!.

GENRES

00s Artists, 80's Pop, 90's Pop, Female Solo, POP.
